_header: Upon a lady my love is lent
_description: A song of Love to the Virgin Mary — seven quatrains (abab)

BlCottCalAII.First Lines:
Vpon a lady my loue ys lenteWith owten change of any
                    chere…
BlCottCalAII.Last Lines:
…To brynge vs alle to heuen lyȝthAmen say we for
                    charyte
BlCottCalAII.Note:
Seven cross-rhymed quatrains. Omitted from sixteenth-century list of
                    contents, f. 1.
